channel.title: [508]Wilderness killing error
channel.description:
Hey i have a problem with wilderness killing when i kill a people the server panel shows that error and shut down (connection lost) here is the error please help i am using davidscape v5 source
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at DavidScape.players.Player.applyDead(Player.java:4510) at DavidScape.players.Player.process(Player.java:4253) at DavidScape.Engine.run(Engine.java:294) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

item.title: [508]Wilderness killing error
